en: Pregnant women who smoke endanger their unborn babies.
yr: Ńṣe làwọn aboyún tó ń mu sìgá ń fẹ̀mí oyún inú wọn wewu.

en: I might travel out to a quiet place in the month of January. .
yr: Ó sése kí n rin  ìrìn àjò lọ sí ibi tó farasin ní oṣù January.

en: The benefits of massage have long been recognized in almost all cultures.
yr: Ó fẹ́rẹ̀ẹ́ jẹ́ pé nínú gbogbo àwùjọ ẹ̀dá ni wọ́n ti mọ àwọn àǹfààní tó wà nínú wíwọ́ ara.

en: Some are challenged physically because of injury, disease, or aging.
yr: Bí àpẹẹrẹ, jàǹbá, àìsàn tàbí ọjọ́ ogbó ti sọ àwọn míì di aláìlera.

en: Kidnapping a man and then selling him was punishable by death.
yr: Bí ẹnì kan bá jí èèyàn gbé tó sì tà á, ńṣe ni wọ́n máa pa ajínigbé náà.
